metadata.synopsis: Kobold Looter has burst out of their coffin looting only to find...nothing, because the player is invisible.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Dig up Kurwin's Coffin- Turn invisible- Interact with/break the coffin

0.speaker: Bugthimble
0.text: What's the big - eh... Where in the Hells are they?
0.context: NodeContext: Initially angry "What's the big idea?!" but then just confused. The person you were going to shout at is nowhere to be seen.
